department: Departement of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description:
Correctional Service of Canada

We are seeking quotes for seven (7) Medium Trucks of multiple configurations from Group 3 in accordance with RFSA E60HP-16TRUK/B to be delivered to different locations throughout Canada.

This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers with a Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA) Supply Arrangement E60HP-16TRUK/B Group 3 Truck, Medium. If you wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to: Tender opportunities | CanadaBuys

Note: Pre-qualified supplier not required for bid submission.

Several Pre-qualified suppliers under this RFSA \
full_summary: ## Request for Proposal (RFP) for Medium Trucks ### Table of Content - [Request for Proposal (RFP) Details](#request-for-proposal-rfp-details) - [Document and Contact Information](#document-and-contact-information) - [Bidding Requirements and Instructions](#bidding-requirements-and-instructions) ### Request for Proposal (RFP) Details The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the delivery of seven (7) medium trucks of multiple configurations from Group 3, as per RFSA E60HP-16TRUK-B. The RFP features the following key details: * **RFP Title:** RFP 21120-234865: Request for Proposal for Medium Trucks * **RFP Publication Date:** October 26, 2022 * **Tender Closing Date:** November 21, 2022 (2:00 pm EST) * **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 30, 2022 (subject to change) * **Expected Contract End Date:** Ongoing The RFP is open only to suppliers with a Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA) Supply Arrangement E60HP-16TRUK-B Group 3 Truck, Medium. Suppliers interested in becoming a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA should refer to the [Tender opportunities](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders/opportunities) page on the CanadaBuys website. ### Document and Contact Information For more information on this RFP, please access the [Ariba Discovery posting](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14418794?extsite=MTQ0MTg3OTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). You can also contact Jacques Legault, PSPC at **jacques.legault@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca** for further assistance. ### Bidding Requirements and Instructions To submit a bid, please refer to the RFP document and ensure that your bid is received by the Department by November 21, 2022, at 2:00 pm EST. Failure to comply with the bidding
